<!-- This file was @generated by `just docgen-kit-std`. -->

Implements typechecking instance attributes.

## Functions

### Attribute

```luau
function attributes.Attribute(
	name: string,
	check: t.check<T>,
	default: T?
): Attribute<T>
```

Creates a new `Attribute` object with the name, an optional typecheckr, and
an optional default value.

#### Parameters

##### name <small>`: string`</small>

The name of the attribute.

##### check <small>`: t.check<T>`</small>

An optional `t.check` function to validate the type of the attribute's value.

##### default <small>`: T?`</small>

An optional default value for the attribute if it's not set or invalid.#### Returns

#####  `Attribute<T>`

A new `Attribute` object.`
